Poetic Translation: If in the morning when you wake,

Lyrics: Vous tremble teste, pied ou main,
Poetic Translation: Your hands and feet and head do shake,

Direct Translation: See Mick Swithinbank's work at Choral Public Domain Library.
Poetic Translation: There's just one thing to cure your plight:

Lyrics: Du poil du chien qui vous mordit.
Poetic Translation: Hair of the dog that bit last night.
